meanings.definition: A wealthy, fashionable man who frequents fashionable places.
meanings.sent1: The boulevardier strolled confidently down the street, dressed in his finest suit.
meanings.sent2: The boulevardier was a regular at the upscale cafe, always seen sipping espresso.
meanings.sent3: The boulevardier decided to wear a top hat to the beach, causing quite a stir.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, he was a true boulevardier, always setting trends effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The image of the boulevardier in his tailored tuxedo lingered in everyone's minds.

meanings.definition: A person who frequents the boulevards.
meanings.sent1: As a boulevardier, he enjoyed taking leisurely walks along the tree-lined streets.
meanings.sent2: The boulevardier greeted his neighbors with a friendly smile during his daily stroll.
meanings.sent3: The boulevardier found a lost puppy during his walk and returned it to its owner.
meanings.sent4: The boulevardier's presence on the streets added a touch of elegance to the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: Every morning, the boulevardier would start his day with a peaceful walk under the sun.
